hotels.title: Maldives Private Island Five-Star Resort with Beachfront or Overwater Villas & Padi Dive Centre
hotels.description: Nestled amidst crystal-clear waters and pristine beaches of the Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, this dreamlike Maldivian paradise offers indulgence like no other. The resort boasts eight exquisite bars and restaurants, each offering a unique culinary journey, with the Indian Ocean, coconut groves and breathtaking sunsets as your backdrop. At Vakkaru Maldives, wellness and relaxation are at the heart of your stay. Unwind at the Merana Spa, where skilled therapists provide rejuvenating treatments and specialised Ayurveda by Siddhalepa holistic therapy. When you're not basking in the resort's tranquility, dive into the vibrant underwater world with the onsite dive centre or enjoy the thrill of motorised water sports. Prefer a calmer pace? Opt for a paddle through the crystalline waters on a kayak or paddleboard, or make the most of the sports fields with a game of volleyball or padel.

hotels.title: Maldives Private Island Barefoot Luxury with the World's First Zipline Fine-Dining Experience
hotels.description: **Update: 11th December 2024:** As per the amendments to the Tourism Act issued by the Maldivian Government, applicable to all travellers arriving in the Maldives from 1 January 2025, the green tax payable by travellers upon arrival at hotels (including tourist resorts, tourist hotels, hotels, tourist guest houses, tourist vessels) has been increased from USD 6.00 to USD 12.00 per person per day. Dive into a world of unparalleled barefoot luxury at Soneva Fushi, holding a prime position in the Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve in the Maldives. When you're not being dazzled by the natural wonders of your immediate surroundings - crystalline lagoons and verdant jungle are just the beginning - take a culinary journey into gastronomy grandeur at the 11 onsite restaurants. Be wined and dined to Michelin-star standard at Flying Sauces, the world's first fine-dining zipline experience. Or, savour Vietnamese, Japanese and Indonesian cuisine at Out of the Blue, a restaurant floating right on the waters of the Indian Ocean. After the sun has set, the open-air Cinema Paradiso located right on the beach is the perfect way to cap off a day of bliss.

hotels.title: Five-Star Oceanfront Maldives Paradise with Resort Pool, Seven Gourmet Dining Outlets & Poolside Bar
hotels.description: Savour moments of pure tropical bliss overlooking the sparkling lagoon framed by swaying palms at Avani+ Fares Maldives Resort. Indulge in direct access to the secluded beach, enjoy a drink beside the resort pool, or explore the colourful nearby reef. Enhance your opulent ocean stay with a visit to the resortâ€™s spa for an impressive treatment, or with a delectable meal at one of seven dining options, each boasting tantalizing menus and unparalleled ambiance.

hotels.title: Idyllic Maldives Villa Indulgence with Private Pool & Underwater Restaurant
hotels.description: Feel the magic of the Maldives all around you at Anantara Kihavah Maldives Villas, a resplendent island oasis within the breathtaking Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve. Drink champagne beneath the stars at SKY, dine under the ocean's placid surface and watch colourful marine life pass you by at SEA or choose from four other experiential restaurants. Take advantage of personalised wellness programs and ayurvedic spa pampering so you return home feeling reset and renewed.

hotels.title: Secluded Maldives Private Pool Bliss with 10 Onsite Dining Venues, Cellar Door & World-Class Spa
hotels.description: Experience the tropical high life at this secluded five-star sanctuary located in the Maldives' Baa Atoll. Surrounded by crystal-clear turquoise waters, lush greenery and white sandy beaches, this breathtaking resort takes its rightful place as a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World, being the only Maldives resort in the Considerate Collection. Dine on fresh seafood at the overwater Japanese restaurant, Feeling Koi, enjoy a cocktail at the laidback Emperor Beach Club or take a dip in your villa's private pool. Explore the vibrant coral reefs, teeming with marine life, take a stroll along the pristine beach, or indulge in a beauty treatment at Javvu Spa.
